original_text: God knows what people truly believe. He showed clearly that he accepts Gentile believers as his people. He gave his Holy Spirit to them in the same way that he did for us.
korean_text: 또 마음을 아시는 하나님이 우리에게와 같이 그들에게도 성령을 주어 증언하시고

sentences.original_text: God knows what people truly believe.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 사람들이 진실로 믿는 것을 아십니다.

sentences.original_text: He gave his Holy Spirit to them
in the same way that he did for us.
